previewArticle.title: Real Salt Lake vs. Colorado Rapids | MLS Match Preview

recapArticle.title: Real Salt Lake 2, Colorado Rapids 1 | MLS Match Recap

timelineItems.desc: The first installment of the Rocky Mountain Cup is ahead when Real Salt Lake play host to the Colorado Rapids on Saturday evening at Rio Tinto Stadium.
timelineItems.title: KICKOFF: Real Salt Lake vs Colorado Rapids

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.

timelineItems.name: Sean Walker
timelineItems.text: “Come on, DLH; make him an offer he can’t refuse.” OK, then. #RSLvCOL http://t.co/phy68sY2Ir

timelineItems.name: Sean Walker
timelineItems.text: “Come on, DLH; make him an offer he can’t refuse.” OK, then. #RSLvCOL http://t.co/phy68sY2Ir

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Deshorn Brown (Colorado Rapids) right footed shot from long range on the left is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Nathan Sturgis.

timelineItems.name: Colorado Rapids
timelineItems.text: We're underway! Tune in live on @AltitudeTV. #RSLvCOL #Rapids96. Any predictions for a final score?

timelineItems.comment: Joao Plata (Real Salt Lake) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Drew Moor (Colorado Rapids).

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: Dangerous ball from Brown cross-goal nearly finds Buddle for what would’ve been 100th career goal. Just unable to connect. #Rapids96

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: Wynne with a monster block, looked like Sandoval’s shot was goal-bound. Second big clearance from Wynne so far. #Rapids96

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Redefining adorable. RT @greenblackstar: Never too young to understand the Star Bangled Banner. Game time! #RSL http://t.co/7VN0nu6SFq

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Redefining adorable. RT @greenblackstar: Never too young to understand the Star Bangled Banner. Game time! #RSL http://t.co/7VN0nu6SFq

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: Serna shot from outside goes high- but spacing for Serna is Mastroeni’s idea. Serna so dangerous in one-on-one situations. #Rapids96

timelineItems.name: Colorado Rapids
timelineItems.text: Goal-saving block from Marvell Wynne! Plata crosses to Sandoval, who is open for a shot from 15 yards, by Marv stops it. #Rapids96 #RSLvCOL

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Cole Grossman (Real Salt Lake).
Dillon Powers (Colorado Rapids) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Real Salt Lake
timelineItems.text: 15' - #RSL dictating pace & tempo, but final shot/pass well-defended by COL

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Chris Wingert (Real Salt Lake) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the center of the goal.
timelineItems.title: SAVE: Clint Irwin pushes aside a Wingert attempt

timelineItems.comment: Drew Moor (Colorado Rapids) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Devon Sandoval (Real Salt Lake).

timelineItems.name: Sean Walker
timelineItems.text: Colorado's center backs seem to be keying in well on Sandoval and Plata. Can the Rapids keep that defensive effort all game? #RSLvCOL

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Chris Wingert (Real Salt Lake) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Javier Morales.

timelineItems.name: Chris Kamrani
timelineItems.text: 17' Wingert's right-footed rip isn't handled by Irwin, but the Colorado keeper does well to not spill it into the center of the box. #RSL

timelineItems.name: Heath Waddingham
timelineItems.text: So far this season (by my count) #RSL has scored 8 goals in the first 20 minutes of games and 8 goals in the last 20 minutes.

timelineItems.name: Colorado Rapids
timelineItems.text: Irwin makes a nice save on Wingert shot, pushing the knuckling ball out of danger. 0-0, 18' #Rapids96 #RSLvCOL #RockyMtnCup

timelineItems.name: Ryan Petrynka
timelineItems.text: Not sure if I'm watching @MLS or a Spain vs France friendly. #RSLvCOL #RockyMtnCup

timelineItems.name: Regan R. Duckworth
timelineItems.text: "Fighting through it like Solange in an elevator." Oh @OriginalWinger, you are the best. #RSL

timelineItems.name: Sean Walker
timelineItems.text: And we're off; Colorado's defense, or RSL's pursuit, of the Rocky Mountain Cup is officiall underway. #RSLvCOL

timelineItems.name: Vector
timelineItems.text: Never too young to understand the Star Bangled Banner. Game time! #RSL http://t.co/Q1o2hw7xU9

timelineItems.name: Vector
timelineItems.text: Never too young to understand the Star Bangled Banner. Game time! #RSL http://t.co/Q1o2hw7xU9

timelineItems.name: Alex Erickson®
timelineItems.text: Commentator just said that Sandoval was "fighting through it like Solange in an elevator" like that's now a common expression. #RSL

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Colorado Rapids. Marc Burch tries a through ball, but Deshorn Brown is caught offside.
Match ends, Real Salt Lake 2, Colorado Rapids 1.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Three points. Time to dance, @JoaoPlata10. http://t.co/6766wyH0oZ #RSLvCOL http://t.co/tyZjLMMRN2

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Three points. Time to dance, @JoaoPlata10. http://t.co/6766wyH0oZ #RSLvCOL http://t.co/tyZjLMMRN2

timelineItems.desc: The first installment of the Rocky Mountain Cup is ahead when Real Salt Lake play host to the Colorado Rapids on Saturday evening at Rio Tinto Stadium.
timelineItems.title: HIGHLIGHTS: Real Salt Lake vs Colorado Rapids | May 17, 2014

timelineItems.name: Kylie Bearse
timelineItems.text: Yup, @RealSaltLake fans are the best #RSLvCOL http://t.co/GBipC2DqDz

timelineItems.name: Kylie Bearse
timelineItems.text: Yup, @RealSaltLake fans are the best #RSLvCOL http://t.co/GBipC2DqDz

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Chris Klute (Colorado Rapids) right footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Nick LaBrocca.

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  Real Salt Lake 1, Colorado Rapids 0. Joao Plata (Real Salt Lake) left footed shot from the center of the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Javier Morales.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Joao Plata slides a shot past Irwin and into the back of the net

timelineItems.name: Real Salt Lake
timelineItems.text: 24' - PLATA!! Great interplay from Sandoval & Morales to put #RSL up 1-0

timelineItems.name: Kris Lindsay
timelineItems.text: 1-0 to RSL after Plata finishes with his signature far post roller #RSLvCOL 24'

timelineItems.name: Randy Chipman
timelineItems.text: The buildup and passing that leads to Plata’s goal is amazing. #rsl

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Javier Morales (Real Salt Lake).
Dillon Powers (Colorado Rapids) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Justin Carmony
timelineItems.text: Gotta love #rsl’s Plata. Such a smart player who finds the right place to be at the right time.

timelineItems.name: Devin @ TBS
timelineItems.text: Plata is a much better soccer player than I am, but we are equals in the celebratory dance department. #RSL #RSLvCOL

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Colorado Rapids. Conceded by Cole Grossman.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Great buildup by @RealSaltLake and a great finish from Platita. 1-0 to #RSL. Watch with us: http://t.co/b2xgUQAJ9T #RSLvCOL

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Edson Buddle (Colorado Rapids) shot from the center of the box is close, but misses to the left.
timelineItems.title: MISS: Edson Buddle launches a header just wide of goal

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Edson Buddle (Colorado Rapids) header from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the left. Assisted by Dillon Powers with a cross following a corner.

timelineItems.name: Colorado Rapids
timelineItems.text: #Rapids96 earn a corner- Powers serves, Buddle gets a head on it but it's just high. #RSLvCOL

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: Great turn and pass from Morales to set that up. Klute couldn’t get over fast enough, #Rapids96 down 1-0. 24'

timelineItems.comment: Javier Morales (Real Salt Lake) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Dillon Powers (Colorado Rapids).

timelineItems.name: Fútbol MLS
timelineItems.text: ¡GOOOL! (24') | Joao Plata abre la cuenta luego de una gran combinación entre Javier Morales y Devon Sandoval. #RSLvCOL 1-0

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: Buddle was there on the corner- heads high. Got to put it on goal. 1-0 RSL 26'

timelineItems.name: Heath Waddingham
timelineItems.text: 27': A little communication error there between Attinella and Schuler, but the keeper snuffs out a ball in the box. #RSLvCOL

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Colorado Rapids. Nathan Sturgis tries a through ball, but Edson Buddle is caught offside.

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Ned Grabavoy (Real Salt Lake) right footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the center of the goal.
timelineItems.title: CHANCE – Ned Grabavoy fires a shot directly at Irwin

timelineItems.name: Heath Waddingham
timelineItems.text: 28': Plata applies the pressure to Clint Irwin and forces the Rapids keeper to kick the ball out of bounds. #RSLvCOL

timelineItems.name: Andy Edwards
timelineItems.text: Every @MLSFantasy transfer I made this week has scored. RT @RealSaltLake: 24' - PLATA!! #RSL 1-0

timelineItems.name: Scott D. Pierce
timelineItems.text: Joao Plata is now tied with Alavro Saborio (6 goals each) as #RSL's leading scorer. #RSLvCOL

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Ned Grabavoy (Real Salt Lake) left footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Javier Morales.

timelineItems.name: William L Marshall
timelineItems.text: #Rapids96 employing the hot butter method of defending, rsl supplying the knife, #RSLvCOL

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: Mastroeni, as he said he’d be this week, looking more fired up than normal on the touchlines. #Rapids96

timelineItems.name: Heath Waddingham
timelineItems.text: 30': Morales frees Nedinho into the box, but Irwin is equal to the task. #RSLvCOL

timelineItems.comment: Javier Morales (Real Salt Lake) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Nathan Sturgis (Colorado Rapids).

timelineItems.desc: Cole Grossman (Real Salt Lake) is shown the yellow card.
timelineItems.title: YELLOW CARD: Cole Grossman is booked for tugging on Serna

timelineItems.name: Don Eisenbarth
timelineItems.text: Plata's start is once again one of the most amazing I've ever seen. Kids got a great future. #RSL

timelineItems.name: Sean Walker
timelineItems.text: 30' Ned Grabavoy looks for a low shot against Irwin, but the Elon grad stones Nedinho. #RSLvCOL

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: Couple rare bobbles/missed touches from Irwin. None have cost #Rapids96 yet.

timelineItems.comment: Javier Morales (Real Salt Lake) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Nick LaBrocca (Colorado Rapids).

timelineItems.name: Colorado Rapids
timelineItems.text: Cole Grossman gets a yellow card for tugging on Serna's uniform in the 33rd minute. #Rapids96 #RSLvCOL #RockyMtnCup

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Cole Grossman (Real Salt Lake).
Dillon Serna (Colorado Rapids) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Luke Mulholland (Real Salt Lake) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Nathan Sturgis (Colorado Rapids).

timelineItems.name: Jeremy Heeringa
timelineItems.text: Javi doesn't have the power on his shot that he used to, but his passing and touch are still sublime - set grabavoy up on a platter #RSL

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Colorado Rapids. Nathan Sturgis tries a through ball, but Edson Buddle is caught offside.
Delay in match Luke Mulholland (Real Salt Lake) because of an injury.

timelineItems.name: Heath Waddingham
timelineItems.text: Looks like @LukeMulholland8 has removed his left shoe while being attended to by trainers. #RSL

timelineItems.name: Chris Kamrani
timelineItems.text: Deshorn Brown has shifted to the left side of the attack. Instead of Beltran, now Wingert must mark the fleet-footed Rapid. #RSL

timelineItems.comment: Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Hand ball by Dillon Powers (Colorado Rapids).

timelineItems.name: Nate Sulat
timelineItems.text: I really like the #RSLvCOL rivalry. It might be my favorite in MLS. And before Cascadia gets all up on me: Key words are "MIGHT BE."

timelineItems.name: Chris Kamrani
timelineItems.text: 4' Mulholland plays a ball atop the box into the mix, skips by Moor and Wynne, but Irwin arrives before Plata does. #RSL

timelineItems.name: Kylie Bearse
timelineItems.text: This is epic @RealSaltLake #RSLvCOL http://t.co/PUbFCZRyad

timelineItems.name: Kylie Bearse
timelineItems.text: This is epic @RealSaltLake #RSLvCOL http://t.co/PUbFCZRyad

timelineItems.name: Heath Waddingham
timelineItems.text: Looks like Mullholland removed his right shoe while being attended to by trainers. He's up though. Not sure what happened. #RSL

timelineItems.name: brett®
timelineItems.text: Cole Grossman playing well in Beckermans spot tonight. Hope he's got enough to go 90. #RSLvCOL #RockyMtnCup

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Tony Beltran (Real Salt Lake).
Nathan Sturgis (Colorado Rapids) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: ESPN 700
timelineItems.text: And Luke Mulholland enters back into the match with one less toenail than before. #RSLvCOL #RockyMtnCup

timelineItems.name: Heath Waddingham
timelineItems.text: For what it's worth, when I lost a toenail, I actually felt better than when it was hanging by a thread. #LukeToeholland #RSL

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Edson Buddle (Colorado Rapids) header from the center of the box is close, but misses to the right.
timelineItems.title: CHANCE: An Edson Buddle header glances off the post

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Cole Grossman (Real Salt Lake).
Deshorn Brown (Colorado Rapids) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Attempt missed. Edson Buddle (Colorado Rapids) header from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Dillon Powers with a cross following a set piece situation.

timelineItems.desc: Luke Mulholland (Real Salt Lake) is shown the yellow card for time wasting.
timelineItems.title: YELLOW CARD: Luke Mulholland delays the restart

timelineItems.name: Colorado Rapids
timelineItems.text: Powers lines up a set piece... great service, Buddle rises and flicks- off the post! Nice look from the forward. Close to #Edson100.

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Tony Beltran (Real Salt Lake).
Dillon Powers (Colorado Rapids) wins a free kick on the left wing.

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: OOF! Buddle header glances the post, goes just wide. Closest yet for #Rapids96- they’re knocking on the door.

timelineItems.name: Heath Waddingham
timelineItems.text: Was that another opponent shot off the post? That would make 9 on the season. Only one has gone in. #LuckOTheRoyals #RSLvCOL

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Colorado Rapids. Conceded by Tony Beltran.

timelineItems.name: Colorado Rapids
timelineItems.text: Mulholland picks up yellow for stepping in front of a Powers set piece as he tries to play quickly. Almost to the end of 1st half. #Rapids96

timelineItems.name: brett®
timelineItems.text: Mullholland gunna need a numbing shot & a can of magic spray on that toe at halftime. #RSL #RSLvCOL

timelineItems.name: Colorado Rapids
timelineItems.text: LaBrocca gets a look in the box, but the shot is right at Attinella. End of the 1st half. #Rapids96 #RSLvCOL #RockyMtnCup

timelineItems.name: Chris Kamrani
timelineItems.text: Halftime at Rio Tinto: #RSL 1, Colorado 0. Plata's sixth goal of 2014 has still-unbeaten RSL leading.

timelineItems.name: Sean Walker
timelineItems.text: HT #RSL 1-0 #Rapids96. Plata earns a goal, Mulholland loses a toenail, and Attinella is solid between the sticks. #RSLvCOL

timelineItems.comment: First Half ends, Real Salt Lake 1, Colorado Rapids 0.
Attempt saved. Nick LaBrocca (Colorado Rapids) right footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Dillon Serna.

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: HALF: 1-0 #RSL. Fairly even half, #Rapids96 better side in final 5-10 mins. Came close on two Buddle headers and Brown cross...

timelineItems.name: Travis Cain
timelineItems.text: I am not disappointed, but I am left somewhat unamused by the first 45' of #RSL play(apart from Platas goal, of course)

timelineItems.name: Ned Grabavoyovich
timelineItems.text: The first 45 minutes of the #RSL vs #Rapids game is brought to you by Adidas #BallsIn

timelineItems.name: BrianBenedictCSCS
timelineItems.text: #MLS #RSL 1-0 over the Crapids. HT.#RSL technically superior to any team in the league. Fantastic on the ball, fun to watch. #Possession

timelineItems.name: danmet
timelineItems.text: Another night at the office. Go #RSL http://t.co/JJ6zqMTRcs

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: …#Rapids96 need to figure out a way to score (that’s why they pay me the big bucks). Too many close calls. Need goals. Pure and simple.

timelineItems.name: danmet
timelineItems.text: Another night at the office. Go #RSL http://t.co/JJ6zqMTRcs

timelineItems.name: Abby Hope Acton
timelineItems.text: Mulholland's toe nail ripping out looked extremely painful. How can he keep playing??? #RealSaltLake #RSLvCOL

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: Feels (Mastroeni alluded to this on Sunday) like they’re close to breaking out of scoring slump. Lots of posts.

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: That said, three goals in last 5 1/2 games is not even close to good enough. Mastroeni, Rapids know this.

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: And two of those three goals (down 3-0 to SEA and CHV) were nothing more than consolation. Got to score, and make them count.

timelineItems.name: Heath Waddingham
timelineItems.text: Halftime possession numbers: #RSL 57.9%, Rapids 42.1%. That feels about right. And not bad without Beckerman. #RSLvCOL

timelineItems.name: Heath Waddingham
timelineItems.text: Everyone at Rio Tinto Stadium just won a free haircut. Contestant hit a free kick over a wall and Leo the Lion did an anti-Rimando. #RSL

timelineItems.name: Meghan Saunders
timelineItems.text: Good thing you didn't miss saundert! We're all excited about haircuts now. #RSL @ Rio Tinto Stadium http://t.co/rAb5ulQgzo

timelineItems.name: wendie ladie
timelineItems.text: Hey @ColoradoRapids this is what a full stadium looks like! Beautiful isn't it? #RSLvCOL http://t.co/2o7PYLYiE5

timelineItems.name: wendie ladie
timelineItems.text: Hey @ColoradoRapids this is what a full stadium looks like! Beautiful isn't it? #RSLvCOL http://t.co/2o7PYLYiE5

timelineItems.name: Real Salt Lake
timelineItems.text: 2nd half about to kick, no changes for #RSL ... Grossman, Mulholland carrying yellow cards, Plata with the goal, Morales/Sandoval assisting

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: #Rapids96 tied with #Crew96 for last in #MLS with 7 goals from field of play. And for Rapids, that includes Brown goal off PK rebound.

timelineItems.comment: Second Half begins Real Salt Lake 1, Colorado Rapids 0.
Nick LaBrocca (Colorado Rapids) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Javier Morales (Real Salt Lake).
Offside, Colorado Rapids. Marc Burch tries a through ball, but Dillon Serna is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Colorado Rapids
timelineItems.text: Second half underway! No subs for either side. Tune in on @AltitudeTV! #Rapids96 #RSLvCOL #RockyMtnCup

timelineItems.name: Mircea Divricean
timelineItems.text: Second half RSL @RealSaltLake #RSL having fun at the game http://t.co/WP7VYEjtQR

timelineItems.name: Mircea Divricean
timelineItems.text: Second half RSL @RealSaltLake #RSL having fun at the game http://t.co/WP7VYEjtQR

timelineItems.comment: Hand ball by Luke Mulholland (Real Salt Lake).

timelineItems.desc: Penalty conceded by Drew Moor (Colorado Rapids) after a foul in the penalty area.
timelineItems.title: PENALTY: Drew Moor clips Sandoval in the box

timelineItems.name: Heath Waddingham
timelineItems.text: 4': Mulholland's cross sneaks through the Rapids backline, but no one to tap it home. #RSLvCOL

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: The #RockyMtnCup Stream of the Week is underway. Watch here: http://t.co/8gHG2ViBja #RSLvCOL

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Nick LaBrocca (Colorado Rapids).
Luke Mulholland (Real Salt Lake) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Colorado Rapids
timelineItems.text: #Rapids96 make their first sub in the 49th minute, with Kamani Hill checking in for Nathan Sturgis. #RSLvCOL

timelineItems.name: Sean Walker
timelineItems.text: 49' Nate Sturgis off, Kamani Hill on. Pablo Mastroeni has made his first sub in a Rocky Mountain Cup match. #RSLvCOL

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  Real Salt Lake 2, Colorado Rapids 0. Javier Morales (Real Salt Lake) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the top right corner.
timelineItems.title: PK GOAL: Javier Morales calmly dispatches the spot kick

timelineItems.comment: Penalty conceded by Drew Moor (Colorado Rapids) after a foul in the penalty area.
Penalty Real Salt Lake. Devon Sandoval draws a foul in the penalty area.

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: Looks like a complete dive.

timelineItems.name: Colorado Rapids
timelineItems.text: Morales steps up for #RSL, and finishes high to Irwin's left, as the GK dove the opposite way. 2-0, 52'. #RSLvCOL

timelineItems.name: Daniel Boniface
timelineItems.text: Penalty. Drew Moor called for push in the back on Sandoval. 2-0 #RSL 52'

timelineItems.name: Burgundy Wave
timelineItems.text: Clint Irwin is having the anti 'his first ever game at Rio Tinto' today. #Rapids96

timelineItems.name: Chris Kamrani
timelineItems.text: 52' Morales finishes the PK. Javi goes upper 90 right, Irwin goes left and #RSL leads the Rapids 2-0.

timelineItems.name: Real Salt Lake
timelineItems.text: 52' - MORALES the #maestro buries the PK past Irwin, who has had success stopping #RSL PKs ... RSL up 2 : 0 in 1st of 3 #RockyMtnCup tilts

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: Penalty

timelineItems.name: Real Salt Lake
timelineItems.text: #RSL MF @javi_mo11 with 4 goals, 2 assists in last 7 club goals over 140 min

timelineItems.name: FM Gööner 1886
timelineItems.text: Not going to be easy now. Rapids can't catch a break. Terrible call ref. #Rapids96

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Deshorn Brown (Colorado Rapids) header from very close range is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Marc Burch with a cross.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: . @RealSaltLake go two up on @ColoradoRapids via a Morales penalty kick. http://t.co/EqyDjOtj7j #RSLvCOL

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Ned Grabavoy (Real Salt Lake).
Dillon Powers (Colorado Rapids) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: RT @ColoradoRapids: Brown gets open on a cross from Sturgis but he can't steer the close-range header on goal. #Rapids96 #RSLvCOL

timelineItems.name: Daniel Boniface
timelineItems.text: Interested to see what Kamani Hill brings tonight. Looked good in training Wednesday. #Rapids96

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Colorado Rapids. Conceded by Chris Wingert.

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: Re-watched the PK five times now. Sandoval dove. No two ways about it.

timelineItems.name: RCR
timelineItems.text: #cRapids announcers still complaining about the PK. #RSLvCOL #MLS

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Drew Moor (Colorado Rapids) header from the right side of the six yard box is close, but misses to the left.
timelineItems.title: MISS: Drew Moor sends his open header wide of the mark

timelineItems.comment: Hand ball by Javier Morales (Real Salt Lake).

timelineItems.name: Dan Hartle
timelineItems.text: Another Huge thank you to LaRoca and Adolfo for a wonderful time for Owen #RSL #believe #miracles @… http://t.co/YwL3RSB1fA

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Drew Moor (Colorado Rapids) header from the right side of the six yard box misses to the left. Assisted by Dillon Powers with a cross following a set piece situation.

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: Was just about to tweet what Balboa is saying on the telecast: When does Vicente Sanchez get back? Is it 4-6 weeks yet? #Rapids96

timelineItems.name: Daniel Boniface
timelineItems.text: #Rapids96 need a spark on offense, and Charles Eloundou is not in the 18 tonight. Told it was a coach's decision. #rslvcol

timelineItems.name: Heath Waddingham
timelineItems.text: Wow. Rapids wasting good chances in front of goal. #RSLvCOL

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Colorado Rapids. Conceded by Jeff Attinella.

timelineItems.name: Colorado Rapids
timelineItems.text: Another open header for #Rapids96, but this time Drew Moor can't steer it on goal. Missed opportunity. 57' #RSLvCOL

timelineItems.name: kyleewoyote
timelineItems.text: Hate that PK call by Geiger. Now he's gonna have to let the #crapids get away w/ murder on challenges #RSL

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Drew Moor (Colorado Rapids) header from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the right following a corner.

timelineItems.name: Sean Walker
timelineItems.text: My analysis after the first 5' of #RSLvCOL: @ClintIrwin's all-white GK kit looks sharp. #Analysis

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: Biggest issue for me: #Rapids96 are getting looks, but having trouble putting it on target. Missed shots/headers, not forcing saves.

timelineItems.name: Heath Waddingham
timelineItems.text: #RSL playing with fire right now. Colorado being very kind to the home side, declining to finish its chances. #RSLvCOL

timelineItems.name: Fake Jeff Cassar
timelineItems.text: The bigger the flag the bigger the fan! #rsl @BrandtGoble http://t.co/U0ffM2DliP

timelineItems.name: Fake Jeff Cassar
timelineItems.text: The bigger the flag the bigger the fan! #rsl @BrandtGoble http://t.co/U0ffM2DliP

timelineItems.name: OptaJack
timelineItems.text: 4 - @ColoradoRapids have now scored in 4 consecutive @MLS games against RSL after going 4 straight scoreless. Momentum. #RSLvCOL

timelineItems.name: J Mason Nordfelt
timelineItems.text: This match should be about 6-2 Rapids with how many easy chances they've missed... #RSL

timelineItems.name: FM Gööner 1886
timelineItems.text: Klute has two left feet I swear. #Rapids96

timelineItems.comment: Hand ball by Joao Plata (Real Salt Lake).

timelineItems.name: Fútbol MLS
timelineItems.text: Once de @RealSaltLake: Attinella; Beltrán, Borchers, Schuler, Wingert; Grossman, Mulholland, Grabavoy, Morales; Plata, Sandoval #RSLvCOL

timelineItems.name: Colorado Rapids
timelineItems.text: #Rapids96 players emerge from the tunnel and immediately point and clap at the @C38SG fans in the upper deck!

timelineItems.name: Heath Waddingham
timelineItems.text: This is for you, Garth Lagerway. #RSL http://t.co/hCkamJxWPV

timelineItems.name: Heath Waddingham
timelineItems.text: This is for you, Garth Lagerway. #RSL http://t.co/hCkamJxWPV

timelineItems.name: Fútbol MLS
timelineItems.text: Alineación de @ColoradoRapids: Irwin; Klute, Moor, Wynne, Burch; Serna, LaBrocca, Sturgis, Brown; Powers, Buddle #RSLvCOL

timelineItems.comment: Lineups are announced and players are warming up.

timelineItems.name: Tyson
timelineItems.text: Well done section 35. #rsl @RealSaltLake http://t.co/VFMeUvR707

timelineItems.name: Tyson
timelineItems.text: Well done section 35. #rsl @RealSaltLake http://t.co/VFMeUvR707

timelineItems.name: Heath Waddingham
timelineItems.text: To make it clear, the "DLH" on that last tifo photo is Dell Loy Hansen, owner of #RSL.

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Real Salt Lake. Devon Sandoval tries a through ball, but Joao Plata is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: And when your center back (Moor) has your two best chances of a lengthy stretch of the match, misses are bound to happen.

timelineItems.name: David Lindholm
timelineItems.text: PM preached composure this week, even if giving up a goal. Despite finishing troubles, nice to see #Rapids96 playing well & getting chances.

timelineItems.desc: Javier Morales (Real Salt Lake) is shown the yellow card.
timelineItems.title: YELLOW CARD: Javier Morales dives in the box

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Dillon Powers (Colorado Rapids) header from the centre of the box misses to the right. Assisted by Marc Burch with a cross.

timelineItems.name: Nate Scadlock
timelineItems.text: Games like tonight prove that our normally dominant possession isn't a system thing, but a Beckerman thing. #RSL

timelineItems.comment: Javier Morales (Real Salt Lake) has gone down, but that's a dive.

timelineItems.name: BrianBenedictCSCS
timelineItems.text: #RSL 2-0 over Crapids. Leave it to the Crapids announcing team to say #RSL looks shaky. #awfulannouncing.

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: All said, 2-0 current scoreline not fair to #Rapids96. Match far more even than score indicates.

timelineItems.name: Heath Waddingham
timelineItems.text: And Morales is shown yellow for what Geiger saw as a dive. I couldn't tell from where I'm at. #RSLvCOL

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Edson Buddle (Colorado Rapids) header from the center of the box is saved in the top left corner.
timelineItems.title: CHANCE: Edson Buddle snaps a header at Attinella

timelineItems.name: David Dir
timelineItems.text: Nice job from ref tonight, good job on five even if there was contact , nice #RSLvCOL

timelineItems.name: Colorado Rapids
timelineItems.text: Morales gets a yellow card for a dive in the box. #Rapids96 would've liked to have seen that a few minutes earlier... #RSLvCOL

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Ned Grabavoy (Real Salt Lake).
Dillon Powers (Colorado Rapids) wins a free kick on the right wing.

timelineItems.name: Luke Lohr
timelineItems.text: In Javi's defense, the last dive worked extremely well for RSL. #RSLvCOL

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: Great spot from Geiger to immediately pick out Morales dive, quickly shows him yellow. Another blatant dive.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Edson Buddle (Colorado Rapids) header from the centre of the box is saved in the top left corner. Assisted by Dillon Serna with a cross.

timelineItems.name: Yanks United
timelineItems.text: Horrible dive by Morales. Had pace to beat the defense and get a shot away #RSLvCOL

timelineItems.name: Sean Walker
timelineItems.text: 64' Morales earns a yellow card for going down in the box. Geiger looking at simulation, I guess. #RSLvCOL

timelineItems.comment: Marvell Wynne (Colorado Rapids) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Devon Sandoval (Real Salt Lake).

timelineItems.name: Daniel Boniface
timelineItems.text: Javier Morales gets a yellow for a dive in the box. Replay confirms the call. Not gonna get an Oscar nom anytime soon. #Rapids96

timelineItems.name: Heath Waddingham
timelineItems.text: I figured that dive tweet ended up on MatchCenter when I immediately received a reply from a Rapids fan. #RSLvCOL

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Dillon Serna (Colorado Rapids) left footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the bottom right corner.
timelineItems.title: CHANCE: A low cutting effort from Dillon Serna forces a diving Attinella save

timelineItems.name: Vince Jeevar
timelineItems.text: @RealSaltLake I am not sure "tripped" is the right word. Can't defend that one really. Was a nice move though. #RSL

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Dillon Serna (Colorado Rapids) left footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Edson Buddle.
Corner,  Colorado Rapids. Conceded by Jeff Attinella.

timelineItems.name: Colorado Rapids
timelineItems.text: Serna with an unreal turn in the box, launches a shot at the near post that almost sneaks in. #Rapids96 corner...

timelineItems.name: David Dir
timelineItems.text: was that a Gary smith sighting? 2010mlschampions ! #RSLvCOL great work from Serna

timelineItems.comment: Delay in match Cole Grossman (Real Salt Lake) because of an injury.

timelineItems.name: Real Salt Lake
timelineItems.text: 68' - BIG SAVE Attinella, near post, pushed out for corner after Serna shot ... #RSL 2 : 0 COL #RockyMtnCup

timelineItems.name: Heath Waddingham
timelineItems.text: 6': Cole Grossman looking calm and collected thus far filling in for Kyle Beckerman. #RSLvCOL

timelineItems.desc: Attempt blocked. Ned Grabavoy (Real Salt Lake) left footed shot from the center of the box is blocked.
timelineItems.title: CHANCE: Ned Grabavoy has his shot blocked by a sliding Wynne

timelineItems.name: Sean Walker
timelineItems.text: 68' Great save by Jeff Attinella, who dives to grab Dillon Serna's point blank attempt on goal. #RSLvCOL

timelineItems.name: Spencer
timelineItems.text: @scottdevey @espn700bill @OriginalWinger was about to tweet. @FOXSportsLive needs to sort it out. Sorry #RSL. The league needs them. #MLS

timelineItems.name: Daniel Boniface
timelineItems.text: Very creative play by Dillon Serna to dribble 2 defenders, nearly score, and earn a corner. The kid is fun to watch #Rapids96

timelineItems.name: Josh Clark
timelineItems.text: This is the problem I've had with RSL this season. When they have a lead, they become complacent and invite pressure. #MLS #RSLvCOL #RSLTID

timelineItems.name: FM Gööner 1886
timelineItems.text: Serna is our best offensive player. Need to get him involved more often. #Rapids96

timelineItems.comment: Delay over. They are ready to continue.

timelineItems.name: Andre Sherard
timelineItems.text: Can't say I understand how Serna got through both defenders. Incredible. #RSLvCOL

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: Serna shows his value with a terrific cut-in and nearly scores near-post, good save to keep it 2-0. Rapids continue good spell post-2nd goal

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Kamani Hill (Colorado Rapids) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner.
timelineItems.title: SAVE: Jeff Attinella dives to keep out a Hill shot and blocks the follow up

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Dillon Serna (Colorado Rapids) right footed shot from the right side of the six yard box is saved in the bottom right corner.
Corner,  Colorado Rapids. Conceded by Jeff Attinella.
Attempt missed. Marlon Hairston (Colorado Rapids) right footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Marc Burch following a corner.
Attempt saved. Kamani Hill (Colorado Rapids) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Nick LaBrocca.

timelineItems.name: Sean Walker
timelineItems.text: 73' Attinella makes a big double-save by denying Serna in the corner after laying out seconds previous. #RSLvCOL

timelineItems.name: Matthew P Ronne
timelineItems.text: Sorry for calling Serna selfish for the past couple of weeks. Special player finding his game. #Rapids96

timelineItems.comment: Chris Klute (Colorado Rapids) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Javier Morales (Real Salt Lake).

timelineItems.name: Luke Lohr
timelineItems.text: If you can't have a Rimando, an Attinella will do just fine it seems. #RSLvCOL

timelineItems.name: Daniel Boniface
timelineItems.text: Hairston in for Powers. Kinda expected Labrocca to come off. #backseatmanaging #Rapids96

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: Hill with terrific blast and shot, Attinella a big save, great follow-up save by Attinella on Serna. Best spell by Rapids offense in games.

timelineItems.name: brett®
timelineItems.text: Too bad Beckermans gone. I would love to see his dreds get into a sweet battle with Hairstons dreds. #RSL dreds FTW. #RSLvCOL

timelineItems.name: Gpugnacious
timelineItems.text: @OriginalWinger's soothing voice is enough for me @DrinkWithDunny Mtn Dew is tipped back. #believe #RSLvCOL

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Javier Morales (Real Salt Lake) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Devon Sandoval.
Delay in match Javier Morales (Real Salt Lake) because of an injury.

timelineItems.name: Mike Sanders
timelineItems.text: Colorado is their own worst enemy right now. #RSLvCOL

timelineItems.name: David Lindholm
timelineItems.text: #Rapids96 have gotten every call from the ref since the penalty. Of course, I would've traded that one for the rest...

timelineItems.comment: Delay over. They are ready to continue.

timelineItems.name: David Dir
timelineItems.text: Pablo really does remind me of Gary smith , the team defending,the way he subs, can they repeat the success to match similar style #RSLvCOL

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Devon Sandoval (Real Salt Lake).
Drew Moor (Colorado Rapids) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Luke Lohr
timelineItems.text: #RSL really are a different team without Kyle Beckerman. They move differently and react differently under pressure.

timelineItems.name: Colorado Rapids
timelineItems.text: Brown gets to endline and plays a dangerous ball across the box but no #Rapids96 players can get on the end of it. 7' #Rapids96 #RockyMtnCup

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Ned Grabavoy (Real Salt Lake) left footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Joao Plata.
Luke Mulholland (Real Salt Lake) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Kamani Hill (Colorado Rapids).

timelineItems.name: Heath Waddingham
timelineItems.text: That makes 3 or 4 times tonight that Colorado has attempted to switch the field and sent the ball straight out of bounds. #RSLvCOL

timelineItems.name: Andrew Villegas
timelineItems.text: We're in Salt Lake, and I can say I've never been more disgusted with how this #Rapids96 team has been put together or is playing. Truly.

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Devon Sandoval (Real Salt Lake) left footed shot from the right side of the six yard box is close, but misses to the right.
timelineItems.title: CHANCE: Devon Sandoval directs his effort inches wide

timelineItems.name: Heath Waddingham
timelineItems.text: 20,489 attendance tonight. Standing room only. #RSLvCOL

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Devon Sandoval (Real Salt Lake) left footed shot from the right side of the six yard box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Javier Morales.

timelineItems.name: Sean Walker
timelineItems.text: 80' Mulholland is gassed. I'd expect a change soon for him. Just a guess, though. #RSLvCOL

timelineItems.desc: Goal!  Real Salt Lake 2, Colorado Rapids 1. Drew Moor (Colorado Rapids) header from the center of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Dillon Serna.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Drew Moor sends a diving header past Attinella

timelineItems.name: Real Salt Lake
timelineItems.text: Thanks to the 20,489 SRO sellout crowd tonight ... 3rd capacity crowd in 1st 5 games of 2014, 32nd sellout in #RioT history #RSL

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Ned Grabavoy (Real Salt Lake).
Dillon Serna (Colorado Rapids) wins a free kick on the right wing.

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: Wynne has had a solid game tonight. Been involved in several big clearances. #Rapids96

timelineItems.name: Colorado Rapids
timelineItems.text: #Rapids96 back in it! Drew Moor with a fantastic finish off a Serna set piece. Great service, perfect finish. 2-1, with time for another...

timelineItems.comment: Luke Mulholland (Real Salt Lake) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Kamani Hill (Colorado Rapids).

timelineItems.name: Heath Waddingham
timelineItems.text: For the number of dangerous free kicks the Rapids have had, they were bound to do something with one of them. #RSLvCOL

timelineItems.name: John Coon
timelineItems.text: GOAL! Drew Moor pulls one back for Colorado. Rapids cut #RSL lead to 2-1 in the 83rd minute.

timelineItems.name: Real Salt Lake
timelineItems.text: 85' - Gil entering for Plata, 1st action for Luis since April 5 at KC (hamstring) ... #RSL 2 : 1 COL

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: A goal? A goal! #Rapids96 score on Moor header right into the corner. Offense has woken up big-time this half.

timelineItems.name: Andre Sherard
timelineItems.text: Nice free kick from Serna and a perfectly placed header from the vet, Drew Moor. Game on. #RSLvCOL

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Devon Sandoval (Real Salt Lake).
Nick LaBrocca (Colorado Rapids) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Chris Bianchi
timelineItems.text: Huge for RMC- with still another game at Rio Tinto, re-taking the Cup would’ve been very hard w/out that goal. At least helps in that regard

timelineItems.name: Heath Waddingham
timelineItems.text: Time for #RSL to show what it has learned from its early season late-game troubles.

timelineItems.name: Sean Walker
timelineItems.text: Five minutes + stoppage of a 2-1 game at Rio Tinto Stadium in 2014. This scenario is all too familiar. #RSLvCOL

timelineItems.name: Colorado Rapids
timelineItems.text: Tactical shift from Mastroeni. Mwanga coming in for Burch, #Rapids96 shift to three at the back. 89th minute... #RSLvCOL

timelineItems.name: Chris Kamrani
timelineItems.text: 89' Luis Gil comes on for Joao Plata. First appearance for Gil since picking up injury in 0-0 draw at Sporting KC on April 5. #RSL

timelineItems.name: FM Gööner 1886
timelineItems.text: Seriously, stop with the terribly weighted passes and go for a long shot. #Rapids96

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Dillon Serna (Colorado Rapids) left footed shot from outside the box is too high. Assisted by Dillon Powers.

timelineItems.name: Colorado Rapids
timelineItems.text: Five minutes added... plenty of time for a #Rapids96 equalizer! #RSLvCOL

timelineItems.name: Sean Walker
timelineItems.text: 90' + 2 John Stertzer enters the match for Javier Morales, the goal scorer. Min. 5' of stoppage time. #RSLvCOL

timelineItems.desc: John Stertzer (Real Salt Lake) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
timelineItems.title: YELLOW CARD: John Stertzer tackles Hairston from behind

timelineItems.comment: Marlon Hairston (Colorado Rapids) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by John Stertzer (Real Salt Lake).

timelineItems.name: Heath Waddingham
timelineItems.text: Stertzer shown yellow for a clumsy tackle near midfield. #RSLvCOL

timelineItems.name: Colorado Rapids
timelineItems.text: Stertzer gets a yellow, #Rapids96 free kick. Irwin is in the opposite box, looking for the equalizer... #RSLvCOL

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Devon Sandoval (Real Salt Lake).
Danny Mwanga (Colorado Rapids) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Heath Waddingham
timelineItems.text: And there's the final whistle! #RSL holds on for the 1-0 win over the Rapids!

timelineItems.name: Colorado Rapids
timelineItems.text: Final: #RSL 2, #Rapids96 1. Exciting 2nd half, but Rapids fall short. Moor gets a goal, but Morales' controversial PK is the difference.

timelineItems.comment: Second Half ends, Real Salt Lake 2, Colorado Rapids 1.
